Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body:
, 'Error: Invalid structure
 Caused by: Invalid AttributeNames json has been passed
 Caused by: invalid type: map, expected a string at line 1 column 1
') /usr/lib/python3.5/asyncio/futures.py:274: indy.error.IndyError: (, 'Error: Invalid structure
 Caused by: Invalid bytes for "PublicKey"
') /usr/lib/python3.5/asyncio/futures.py:274: indy.error.IndyError: (, 'Error: Invalid structure
 Caused by: Trying to use did with unexpected len: 0
') /usr/lib/python3.5/asyncio/futures.py:274: indy.error.IndyError: (, 'Error: Wallet item not found
 Caused by: Walelt item not found
') /usr/lib/python3.5/asyncio/futures.py:274: indy.error.IndyError: (, 'Error: Invalid wallet handle was passed
 Caused by: Unknown wallet handle
') /usr/lib/python3.5/asyncio/futures.py:274: indy.error.IndyError: (, 'Error: Invalid parameter 3
 Caused by: Empty string has been passed
') /usr/lib/python3.5/asyncio/futures.py:274: indy.error.IndyError: (, 'Error: Pool ledger config already exists
 Caused by: Pool ledger config file with name "docker" already exists
') /usr/lib/python3.5/asyncio/futures.py:274: indy.error.IndyError: (, 'Error: Invalid structure
 Caused by: Invalid Config json has been passed
 Caused by: missing field `id` at line 1 column 2
') {noformat} >
